page.title: 03WOODINGDEAN : FAMILY OUTINGS
page.content: We often go for walks from our house across the Downs.They are always very long.Sometimes we start at Sunblest Bakery and walk along Jugg's Lane to Kingston, or we go down Old Parish Lane to the beach. We sometimes see animals but not very often. Once we saw an Adder. There are badgers, foxes and rabbits living on the Downs behind our houses. You have to go out very late to see them. Sometimes we all go to Happy Valley Park, or we play on the green near us. If we want to have a meal out, we have to go outside Woodingdean. We always buy fish and chips on Saturday night.
